Ōtaki head-on crash: Second person in stolen ute dies in hospital https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/otaki-head-on-crash-second-person-in-stolen-ute-dies-in-hospital/MLRGBLPJYNAGTILZOQ6PQSVQEM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/otaki-head-on-crash-second-person-in-stolen-ute-dies-in-hospital/MLRGBLPJYNAGTILZOQ6PQSVQEM/ Driver of the vehicle involved in the April 26 accident died on the scene. Sat, 04 May 2024 00:40:53 +0000 Just after 10.30pm April 26, a stolen ute wanted in connection with a robbery in Ōtaki earlier in the evening was signalled to stop by police just south of Levin. It collided head-on with another vehicle just south of Lawlors Rd at about 11.05pm. Photo / Bevan Conley
